channel.title: Symfony Functional Test Case on Alessandro Lai
channel.description: Recent content in Symfony Functional Test Case on Alessandro Lai

item.title: Symfony Functional test case 1.3.0
item.description: This small new release just adds support to Symfony 7; it was needed while doing the same work on the facile-it/mongodb-messenger-transport package.

item.title: Symfony Functional test case 1.2.0
item.description: This small new release just adds support to Symfony 6.

item.title: Symfony Functional test case 1.1.2
item.description: This small patch fixes an issue that arises in Symfony 5.3+, where the command tester fails with this error: Cannot retrieve the container from a non-booted kernel.

item.title: Symfony Functional test case 1.1.1
item.description: This small patch fixes an issue that arises in Symfony 5.3, where the getContainer method in the parent class was made non-static; the same issue was encountered and resolved in the upstream project.

item.title: Symfony Functional test case 1.1.0
item.description: This new minor adds support for using the library with PHP 8.

item.title: Symfony Functional test case 1.0.0
item.description: This is finally the stable release of this forked library, and it only bumps the PHP requirement to PHP 7.2, everything else is the same.
